definition: lit. calamity within one's bosom (idiom); major trouble hidden within

sentences.english: The lamp of the Lord searches the spirit of a man ; it searches out his inmost being.
sentences.chinese: 人的灵是耶和华的灯，鉴查人的心腹。

sentences.english: With the development of this issue, Vietnam will rise to be China's major concern.
sentences.chinese: 随着形势的发展，越南将成为中国的心腹大患。

sentences.english: Ronnie Barnhardt: Yuens, you guys are my infantry.
sentences.chinese: 罗尼元朗“元朗们，你们两个是我的心腹。

sentences.english: Bureaucracy may be said as a disease in our very vitals.
sentences.chinese: 官僚主义可说是我们的心腹之患。

sentences.english: Who knows, after Ding temperament changed and become the ruler a mortal malady.
sentences.chinese: 谁知此后丁竦性情大变而成为人君的心腹大患。

sentences.english: Brighton is the Queen's henchman, who she sends to kill Snow White.
sentences.chinese: 布莱顿是女王的心腹，一个被派去杀白雪公主的人。

sentences.english: Jabba tasked his two competing henchmen to capture the elusive stowaway.
sentences.chinese: 贾巴命令两个勾心斗角的心腹去捉拿逃跑的偷渡者。

sentences.english: This is economic nationalism, but of an insidious type.
sentences.chinese: 这是一种经济民族主义，稍有不慎即成心腹大患。

sentences.english: In addition, Putin doesn't have that many confidants, the source says.
sentences.chinese: 而且，这个消息还说普京也没有那么多的心腹。

sentences.english: Since she was Hermia's bosom friend, the two of them told her their plot.
sentences.chinese: 因为她是赫米亚的心腹密友，他俩把计划告诉了她。

sentences.english: I've seen his henchmen beat women in the fields with rubber hoses .
sentences.chinese: 我亲眼看见他的心腹在田园里用橡皮管痛打女工。

sentences.english: Woman , woman , thou are accountable for this.
sentences.chinese: 这个女人是她的心腹，给斯丹恩买通了的。

definition: aids and advisors of top officials
under one's control or administration/subordinates/(money etc) on hand/sb's financial means/to take action
member of a monarch's inner ministerial circle (old)
direct line of descent/under one's personal command/school or faction passing on faithfully one's doctrine
loyal and devoted (idiom); faithful and true
to guard/to protect/bodyguard (for officials in ancient times)
